unnormalised: Okay, here's a Quora post on Home Loan Schemes:
normalised: What are some good home loan schemes in India right now? Need recommendations!

unnormalised: **What are some good home loan schemes in India right now? Need recommendations!**

normalised: Thinking of finally buying that dream apartment in Mumbai! It has been a long time coming, and I am seriously looking into home loan options now. The whole process feels a bit overwhelming, to be honest.

unnormalised: Thinking of finally buying that dream apartment in Mumbai! It's been a long time coming, and I'm seriously looking into home loan options now. The whole process feels a bit overwhelming, tbh.
normalised: I have heard a lot about different schemes from H D F C, S B I, and I C I C I Bank. Are there any standout deals happening right now? Maybe some festive offers valid till Diwali, around twentieth October two thousand and twenty four?

unnormalised: I've heard a lot about different schemes from HDFC, SBI, and ICICI Bank. Are there any standout deals happening right now? Maybe some festive offers valid till Diwali, around 20/10/2024?
normalised: Specifically, I am interested in schemes that offer good interest rates for first-time homebuyers. Anything aimed at people earning around rupees ten lakhs per annum would be super helpful. I have also been reading about P M A Y (Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana), but I am not sure if I qualify.

unnormalised: Specifically, I'm interested in schemes that offer good interest rates for first-time homebuyers. Anything aimed at people earning around Rs. 10 lakhs per annum would be super helpful. I've also been reading about PMAY (Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana), but I'm not sure if I qualify.
normalised: Ideally, I would like a loan that covers around eighty percent of the property value. The apartment I am eyeing is near Powai, around five kilometer from my office.

unnormalised: Ideally, I'd like a loan that covers around 80% of the property value. The apartment I'm eyeing is near Powai, around 5km from my office.
normalised: Has anyone had a particularly good experience with a specific bank or scheme recently? Maybe applied around first September two thousand and twenty four and got a sweet deal?

unnormalised: Has anyone had a particularly good experience with a specific bank or scheme recently? Maybe applied around 01/09/2024 and got a sweet deal?
normalised: Any tips or recommendations you can share would be greatly appreciated! My appointment with the bank is scheduled for ten hours on tenth October two thousand and twenty four, so I need to be prepared!

unnormalised: Any tips or recommendations you can share would be greatly appreciated! My appointment with the bank is scheduled for 10:00 hrs on 10/10/2024, so I need to be prepared!
normalised: Thanks in advance, and Jai Hind!
